title: Lanyard Kit For The DJI Mavic 3 / Mavic Air 2 / Mini 2 - Drone Valley Gear
features: Custom Lanyard Bracket and Adjustable Lanyard
Keep your controller close and safe
description: This custom Lanyard Kit for your Mavic Air 2 / Mini 2 Controller is designed to allow you to hang your controller around your neck when not in use. The kit includes a comfortable Lanyard that is adjustable to provide the perfect length as well as the bracket needed to attach it to your DJI Mavic Air 2 / Mini 2 Controller. This is a great solution that allows you to help you keep your controller safe while flying!
